sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'], }) export class HomeComponent { products = [ 'digifitindia ISA', 'digifitindia Mentorship', 'digifitindia Profile Building', 'digifitindia College Counsellors', 'digifitindia Finances', 'digifitindia Abroad Admission' ]; students = [ { name: 'Mentorship', desc: 'Access guidance from top industry professionals and structured mentorship programs to expedite career growth.', icon: 'partner_exchange' }, { name: 'Networking Opportunity', desc: 'Forge connections with leading professionals and organizations globally, fostering collaborative growth and expansive networks.', icon: 'diversity_2' }, { name: 'Global Education', desc: 'Seize the potential of merit-based scholarships to access diverse educational opportunities worldwide, broadening horizons and experiences.', icon: 'travel_explore' }, { name: 'Access To Growth Capital', desc: 'Empower your aspirations with merit-based funding, opening doors to global opportunities and expansive growth potential.', icon: 'school' } ]; mentors = [ { name: 'Influence Over Talent', desc: 'Harness your expertise to empower talent growth, foster team building, and make a meaningful impact through valuable connections.', icon: 'stat_2' }, { name: 'Massive Social Impact', desc: 'Seize the opportunity to drive purposeful change through investment, leading to significant social impact.', icon: 'diversity_3' }, { name: 'Access to Community', desc: 'Join a vibrant community where you can connect with fellow experts, peers, and emerging talents, building a robust network for collaboration and support.', icon: 'diversity_1' }, { name: 'Higher Returns', desc: 'Experience anticipated XIRR returns of up to 100%, surpassing all other investment options, rewarding your mentorship with substantial financial gains.', icon: 'redeem' } ] }
Fitness Unbound: Where Effort Meets Elegance

Smart Mentorship and Growth Capital Unleashed

digifitindia breaks away from traditional credit scores, introducing 'TxScore', a proprietary score analysing a student's probable success using criteria such as Placement Rate, Average Salary, College Rank, Career Sector, Academic History.
